caller_intent: Roxana is seeking assistance to finalize home insurance coverage for her primary residence and a second home, ensuring proper address differentiation and confirming policy details before a deadline.
resolution_steps: Brandi confirms NC Grange is processing the application and addresses the need to differentiate two homes with the same address by using suffixes (104A and 104B).
Brandi gathers details about the roof age (less than 5 years), heating system (new central air unit), electrical (no updates), and plumbing (PVC).
Brandi notes the purchase date (2018) and confirms no claims in the past 5 years.
Brandi states she will email a finalized quote and requests driver's licenses for Roxana's husband and sister to add them to the policy.
systems_referenced: Main Street America (another carrier with limited access)
summary: Roxana works with Brandi to finalize home insurance for two properties under the same address, clarifying policy details and ensuring processing before a deadline. Brandi will send a quote and request additional documents for policy completion.
